cert.Description: A client certificate to authenticate with.

cloud.Description: An entry in a `clouds.yaml` file to use.

default_domain.Description: The name of the Domain ID to scope to if no other domain is specified. Defaults to `default` (Identity v3).

domain_id.Description: The ID of the Domain to scope to (Identity v3).

domain_name.Description: The name of the Domain to scope to (Identity v3).

force_sss_endpoint.Description: The SSS Endpoint URL to send API.

key.Description: A client private key to authenticate with.

project_domain_id.Description: The ID of the domain where the project resides (Identity v3).

project_domain_name.Description: The name of the domain where the project resides (Identity v3).

region.Description: The Enterprise Cloud region to connect to.

tenant_id.Description:
The ID of the Tenant (Identity v2) or Project (Identity v3)
to login with.

tenant_name.Description:
The name of the Tenant (Identity v2) or Project (Identity v3)
to login with.

token.Description: Authentication token to use as an alternative to username/password.

user_domain_id.Description: The ID of the domain where the user resides (Identity v3).

user_domain_name.Description: The name of the domain where the user resides (Identity v3).
